article: A man liked to climb tall mountains. After years of _ , he felt he could handle any mountain in the world. During a climbing trip, with five other men, he _ he would first make the final climb and claim the glory, while the others _ . So he headed toward the top and he was _ that there was a full moon.  _ it was foolish to climb at night alone, he did use a rope and put in good piton protection. With the _ of the moon, he made rapid progress. But _ , thick clouds were starting to build around the mountain. In just a few minutes visibility _ to almost zero. It was now too late to turn back , so he continued to climb up the mountain. While _ in total darkness, he got into some rotten rock, and slid over the edge of a cliff . The good news is that he was still _ after the fall, although he found himself hanging from his rope. The bad news is, he had _ his heavy coat during the fall and the night air was getting colder and colder. Suddenly, from above he seemed to hear a strong deep voice, " _ the rope!" What? Once again, he heard a deep voice saying that. But _ followed, as the climber continued to hang onto the rope, hoping to grab something that would enable him to climb to _ . Unable to see his true _ , the climber concluded that hanging onto the rope was his only _ . The following day, his teammates discovered him _ to death, still on his rope --- only eight feet _ a large rock. If the climber had cut the rope, he would have dropped down to a ly safe area, where he could have built a _ , and probably survived the night.
